body:
SELECT
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0004]/value as T0_height_length,
  b/data[at0002]/events[at0003]/data[at0001]/items[at0004]/value as T0_weight,
  d/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0004]/value as T0_body_mass_index
FROM
  EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS (
    OBSERVATION a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.height.v2]
    and OBSERVATION b[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.body_weight.v2]
    and OBSERVATION d[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.body_mass_index.v2]
  )
ORDER BY
  c/context/start_time/value DESC
LIMIT
  1
